thread.title: Blue Ivy is ‘so excited’ to become a big sister after mum Beyoncé announces pregnancy with twins
thread.title_full: Blue Ivy is ‘so excited’ to become a big sister after mum Beyoncé announces pregnancy with twins

author: Jessica Gibb
title: Blue Ivy is ‘so excited’ to become a big sister after mum Beyoncé announces pregnancy with twins
text:
Blue Ivy is ‘so excited’ to become a big sister after mum Beyoncé announces pregnancy with twins Blue has been an only child for five years Share Beyonce with daughter Blue Ivy (Photo: Twitter) Share Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
After five years as an only child, Blue Ivy is getting ready to become a big sister to not one, but TWO siblings. 
Beyoncé , 35, announced yesterday that she’s expecting with twins with her husband Jay Z . 
And their firstborn is reportedly “so excited” to be a big sister. Read More Blue Ivy will have to learn to share her pop princess crown 
"Blue is so excited to be a big sister,” a source told Us Weekly . 
“[Beyoncé and Jay] are ecstatic. They have been trying for a long time and now to be blessed with twins they are so over the moon. It's even better than they wished for.” 
The Lemonade singer and Jay Z, 47, got married in 2008 and welcomed Blue in January 2012. Read More Beyoncé dressed up as Barbie with Blue and Jay Z on Halloween (Photo: Instagram) 
Beyoncé previously admitted that she’d love some “company” for Blue. 
"I would like more children," she told ABC News in May 2013. 
“I think my daughter needs some company. I definitely love being big sister [to Solange Knowles]…. I am very protective.” Blue Ivy won't be an only child for much longer (Photo: Getty) 
Despite growing up alone, Blue is already “extremely close” to her mum’s friend Kelly Rowland’s son. 
The five year old is said to be great friends with Kelly’s two-year-old son Titan . 
"Yes, they are extremely close. It's the sweetest thing,” Kelly told E! News. “It's the greatest thing about friendship when you're able to grow up together and your children are able to grow up together and it's just years.” Kelly Rowland and baby Titan pictured in 2015 (Photo: Splash) 
Bey made the big announcement on Instagram yesterday. 
"We would like to share our love and happiness," she wrote in a statement on the social media site. "We have been blessed two times over. 
"We are incredibly grateful that our family will be growing by two, and we thank you for your well wishes.” Like us on Facebook
